column4: Latest;Phnom Penh: Police sources have said that a Swiss national has died
column5: following an assault in Phnom Penh.------The man has been named as Markus Zahner
column6: 67. It is believed he was the victim of an assault sometime on Saturday night
column7: and died from his injuries on Wednesday
column8: 29 April.------Sources say that Swiss police will work with Cambodian police to investigate the death.
